title: How to get a visa to Canada
text:
If you are looking to intern in Canada during summer, through a program such as MITACs or UARE or via mailing, you will be applying for a work permit visa. The processing time of a work permit visa varies between 20 days to 2 months. Hence, it is in your best interest to apply at the earliest.
The following are required for the work permit visa:
• Offer letter(stating financial support, if any)
• Contract letter
• Proof of personal funds (bank statement)
• Official Transcript /photocopy of the same(the one used to apply for program will do)
• Resume
• Previous internship certificates
• Two passport size photographs
• Original Passport and a xerox copy of the bio page
• English/French proficiency reports( if any)
• Bonafide Certificate
• Photocopies of 10th and 12th board marksheets.
• Cash of 9000 rupees(Card payment is not accepted currently at VFS global, Kolkata)
Items 1 and 2 will be sent to you by your employer(ie the professor/Visiting Students Coordinator of the respective university/company).
page: How to get a visa to Canada

title: Offline Application:
text:
Once you get the hard copies of all the required documents, visit VFS global services centre at Rene Tower, Rajdanga Main road, Kasba, Kolkata . Prior appointment is not required. Once you're at the VFS global office, Canada Section, request for the following:
• Work permit Visa requirements checklist
• Family Information Sheet
• Undertaking
• Application form(can be filled online there and printed for Rs 108)
Complete all the forms and submit.
page: How to get a visa to Canada

title: Additional Information:
text:
• For MITACs and UARE recipients, you'll be applying through the Labour Impact Market Assessment(LIMA) Exception category. Remember to fill in your LIMA/offer of employment number in the application form.
• For more information, visit: VFS-Canada
